name: Node JS with Sequelize
description: Belajar Node Js dengan Sequalize dengan database Mysql
author: Ifan Ferdiansyah

scripts.migrate:fresh: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.migrate:fresh:seed: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
